description: This file serves as the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports core React libraries, CSS styles, and the main App component, and then initializes the React application by rendering the App component into the DOM element with ID 'root' inside a React.StrictMode wrapper.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root React node for rendering, targeting the DOM element with ID 'root'.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component hierarchy (React.StrictMode containing App) into the created root.
